# isValid

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the time range is valid.

## Declaration

```swift
var isValid: Bool { get }
```

## Inspecting Time Ranges

- **start**: The start time of the time range.
- **end**: The end time of the time range.
- **duration**: The duration of the time range.
- **isEmpty**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the time range is empty.
- **isIndefinite**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the time range is indefinite.
